allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: Google Trends Analysis with Python

Added three analysis scripts:
- pytrends version \(free\)
- SERPAPI with matplotlib charts
- SERPAPI with interactive Plotly charts

Features:
- 5-year trend analysis for AI and Crypto
- CSV data export
- High-resolution charts \(matplotlib\)
- Interactive web charts \(Plotly\)
- Environment variable support for API keys

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
